TextView.android:text: See your General Practitioner if you think you or your child might have had an allergic reaction to something. The symptoms of an allergic reaction can also be caused by other conditions. Your General Practitioner can help determine whether it's likely you have an allergy. If your General Practitioner thinks you might have a mild allergy, they can offer advice and treatment to help manage the condition. If your allergy is particularly severe or it's not clear what you're allergic to, your General Practitioner may refer you to an allergy specialist for testing and advice about treatment.
